entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. A few flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
